mappings.comment: cant add another category without changing code, this is a limitation of the approach I took but it is acceptable because it was within parameters for what I wanted out of this tool, the categories map to paths on the remote host, these are examples but you can change them to suit your use case.

extensions.comment: I basically just picked out all the file extensions i use regularly or semi regularly and put them in here, not comprehensive by any means but thats not the point, its json so it can be extended as need be
